182a1(nyi khri): rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang
182a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas pa shes par bya'o//
182a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa'o//
182a4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag
182a5(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skabs yod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// mi spyod do zhes
182a6(nyi khri): bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//
182a7(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/
182a8(nyi khri): mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs
182b1(nyi khri): pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
182b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
182b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar
182b4(nyi khri): yang mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang
182b5(nyi khri): bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum
182b6(nyi khri): pa med cing yongasu zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs mi sdang mi skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam pa
182b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med
182b8(nyi khri): cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tum
183a1(nyi khri): pa tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
183a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin/
183a3(nyi khri): 'di 'ba' shig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 'am/
183a4(nyi khri): 'on kyang de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub
183a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan rab 'byor ting nge
183a6(nyi khri): 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
183a7(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes/
183a8(nyi khri): bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
183b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba bza
183b2(nyi khri): po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla bI rgyal mtshan dpral zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
183b3(nyi khri): yod do/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos kyi dbyings su nges pa
183b4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad la
183b5(nyi khri): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa
183b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges
183b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// phyogs rnam pa
183b8(nyi khri): lta ba zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos
184a1(nyi khri): thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// na mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// /
184a2(nyi khri): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
184a3(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i
184a4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
184a5(nyi khri): de 'dzin yod do// gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya
184a6(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
184a7(nyi khri): yod do// dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi
184a8(nyi khri): sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi bam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i
184b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
184b2(nyi khri): nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snang ba gsal
184b3(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
184b4(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas
184b5(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad mnyam
184b6(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par mthor ba zhes
184b7(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
184b8(nyi khri): do// yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
185a1(nyi khri): rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i
185a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// g.yo ba med pa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// /
185a3(nyi khri): yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin yod do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshigs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
185a4(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// dge bI me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spobs mtha' yas pa zhes
185a5(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin do// chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yongs su gcod pa byed
185a6(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gcig tu rnam par bkod
185a7(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa mon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// srid pa'i gzhi
185a8(nyi khri): thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
185b1(nyi khri): 'thun 'i dang 'ga' 'a med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
185b2(nyi khri): / ting nge 'dzin yod do// smon ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mod do// mtshan nyid yongs spyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mngon par dmigs pa zhes pa'i ting
185b3(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
185b4(nyi khri): yod do// zad mi shes pa'i za ma togs ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par
185b5(nyi khri): sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
185b6(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge/
185b7(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa thams cad 'od byed zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ti
185b8(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa med pa cing gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mo/
185b9(nyi khri): ba dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs po med par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
186a1(nyi khri): yod do// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i
186a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha' ltar chags pa med
186a3(nyi khri): pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur
186a4(nyi khri): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186a5(nyi khri): po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
186a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
186a7(nyi khri): chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kya
186a8(nyi khri): yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po
186b1(nyi khri): gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag
186b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
186b3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan
186b4(nyi khri): tweHdes ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes byar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// bdag
186b5(nyi khri): ni snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur to// zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de la rnam par
186b6(nyi khri): rtog pa de dag med cing rgya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin
186b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
186b8(nyi khri): de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
187a1(nyi khri): @zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting /
187a2(nyi khri): 'dzin to// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ti
187a3(nyi khri): nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin nyid byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin ma yin na/ de la ting
187a4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su
187a5(nyi khri): byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa/ ci ltar na de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
187a6(nyi khri): rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa de ci ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do//
187a7(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin des la rnam par shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa
187a8(nyi khri): byed pa med cing 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes
187b1(nyi khri): pa med do// 'du shes su 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// tshigs 'di ni legs
187b2(nyi khri): par bshad do// ji ltar ngas nyon mongs med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang nas mchog tu bshad de/ de bshad pa ni 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
187b3(nyi khri): kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
187b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyog kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o//
187b5(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi
187b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrim
187b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmig
187b8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
188a1(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
188a2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
188a3(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
188a4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal ba/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// bdag mi dmigs so// sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed
188a5(nyi khri): can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang //
188a6(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang
188a7(nyi khri): lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam
188a8(nyi khri): bar dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/
188b1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
188b2(nyi khri): dang rdza rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
188b3(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
188b4(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgya kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i
188b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
188b6(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// /
188b7(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon
188b8(nyi khri): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste/ sha
189a1(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skyems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
189a2(nyi khri): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i
189a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon
189a4(nyi khri): bar chags par bya ba de lta bu rnam par yod pa ma yod pa ma yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
189a5(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa
189a6(nyi khri): ma lags pa la mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
189a7(nyi khri): kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
189a8(nyi khri): gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// /
189b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so
189b2(nyi khri): skye bo rnam med pa la mngon par zhen pas sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pas yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/
189b3(nyi khri): chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang la med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la
189b4(nyi khri): mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de dag de
189b5(nyi khri): ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongasasu rtogs te/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // /
189b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes mi shes ma mthong ngo // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang
189b7(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos/ 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo // de de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya
189b8(nyi khri): grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin+da na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma
190a1(nyi khri): yin na/ gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi rjes
190a2(nyi khri): ba stek+Sha ji ltar yid mi ches she na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de
190a3(nyi khri): dag ni gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
190a4(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma
190a5(nyi khri): yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang //
190a6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la
190a7(nyi khri): mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la
190a8(nyi khri): mngon par zhen pa yin/ lte bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhi bya'o// gsol pa/
190b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
190b2(nyi khri): du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
190b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub/
190b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan
190b5(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mdo/
190b6(nyi khri): bar zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / sbyin pa'i
190b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
190b8(nyi khri): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par
191a1(nyi khri): zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
191a2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam
191a3(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / bzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
191a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
191a5(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no//
191a6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar
191a7(nyi khri): bslabs na/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
191a8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191b1(nyi khri): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
191b2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de
191b3(nyi khri): mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes
191b4(nyi khri): su mi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
191b5(nyi khri): ba nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
191b6(nyi khri): ba ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
191b7(nyi khri): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i spyo bye nyid kyi phyir la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
191b8(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u drug pa'o// de nas tshe dang /
192a1(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi
192a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'dra
192a3(nyi khri): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
192a4(nyi khri): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang
192a5(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skye bu 'di sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslabs
192a6(nyi khri): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad
192a7(nyi khri): du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ci ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
192a8(nyi khri): du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
192b1(nyi khri): sgyu ma 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom lnga 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
192b2(nyi khri): zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu yang gzhan zhig yin/
192b3(nyi khri): snyam 'am/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
192b4(nyi khri): ya ni snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang
192b5(nyi khri): gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa dang / sna'i
192b6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus
192b7(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
192b8(nyi khri): dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
193a1(nyi khri): zhig snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci'i snyam du sems/ byang chu
193a2(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
193a3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
193a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
193a5(nyi khri): snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid
193a6(nyi khri): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
193a7(nyi khri): ma legs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
193a8(nyi khri): mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go// bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid/
193b1(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//
193b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos ma nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das
193b3(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das/
193b4(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnams par shes pa gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
193b5(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
193b6(nyi khri): ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te/
193b7(nyi khri): reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
193b8(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig
194a1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
194a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus ste reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
194a3(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
194a4(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/
194a5(nyi khri): sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// bcom 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
194a6(nyi khri): te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
194a7(nyi khri): yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am
194a8(nyi khri): 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das do ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs
194b1(nyi khri): pa 'amaHrnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing
194b2(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
194b3(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
194b4(nyi khri): snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda' dang gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/
194b5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang brda' dang gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam
194b6(nyi khri): gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
194b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda' med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad du med pa dang /
194b8(nyi khri): ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi khas med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang /
194b9(nyi khri): ngag gi las med
195a1(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
195a2(nyi khri): ba nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
195a3(nyi khri): baHrab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
195a4(nyi khri): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems
195a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
195a6(nyi khri): de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bu rig par bgyi ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam/ sems/ phung po lnga po 'di
195a7(nyi khri): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad
195a8(nyi khri): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po 'di rnams ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchiso// /
195b1(nyi khri): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/
195b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa
195b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam na dngos
195b4(nyi khri): dngosapo ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i dang / sgra brnyan
195b5(nyi khri): lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam
195b6(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta skye ma
195b7(nyi khri): ni dngos po ma mchis bI rang bzhin/ sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa
195b8(nyi khri): rang bzhin/ mig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po med pa'i ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs
195b9(nyi khri): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta na/
196a1(nyi khri): 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor
196a2(nyi khri): gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga
196a3(nyi khri): 'o/ rab 'byoro gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drag/
196a4(nyi khri): de ni blo lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dang
196a5(nyi khri): bopo drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa ni gang yin pa de ni
196a6(nyi khri): dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor bya dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang
196a7(nyi khri): yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yi/
196a8(nyi khri): ba de ni dbang po drag go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
196b1(nyi khri): de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag pa mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
196b2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang
196b3(nyi khri): mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
196b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sdang mi skrag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
196b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag
196b6(nyi khri): ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
196b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
196b8(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
197a1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba rtogs te de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar
197a2(nyi khri): rtogs te de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
197a3(nyi khri): ba'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
197a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog
197a5(nyi khri): te mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
197a6(nyi khri): shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs
197a7(nyi khri): so sngo tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/
197a8(nyi khri): gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs
197b1(nyi khri): te de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
197b2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas/
197b3(nyi khri): ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
197b4(nyi khri): gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
197b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
197b6(nyi khri): rtogs par byed do// de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
197b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdags med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
197b8(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
198a1(nyi khri): gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/
198a2(nyi khri): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
198a3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i
198a4(nyi khri): rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'a byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
198a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
198a6(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du
198a7(nyi khri): bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngom 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par
198a8(nyi khri): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang
198b1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
198b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtogs pa'i de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la
198b3(nyi khri): gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
198b4(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos bston to// gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med/
198b5(nyi khri): ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
198b6(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / spyong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// snyam mo//
198b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs
198b8(nyi khri): mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i me nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
199a1(nyi khri): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs
199a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid byed de/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed/
199a3(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
199a4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
199a5(nyi khri): dang sgra rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang //
199a6(nyi khri): dben pa'i rnam par shes par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
199a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
199a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang //
199b1(nyi khri): zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du ba ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs
199b2(nyi khri): par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa'
199b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag mi par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
199b4(nyi khri): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
199b5(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes
199b6(nyi khri): bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
199b7(nyi khri): ba'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces
199b8(nyi khri): bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
200a1(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi stong zhing /
200a2(nyi khri): brtson 'gras mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
200a3(nyi khri): chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
200a4(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
200a5(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pas/ byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs
200a6(nyi khri): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
200a7(nyi khri): med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang
200a8(nyi khri): chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ces bya ba dang /
200b1(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
200b2(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
200b3(nyi khri): gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs
200b4(nyi khri): mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po bcu gnyis pa'o//
200b5(nyi khri): / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
200b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di lta bu rab tu rtogs te/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyis/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// /
200b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong
200b8(nyi khri): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
201a1(nyi khri): lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa/
201a2(nyi khri): ma yin gyis/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong ba ma yin gyi/ chos nyid
201a3(nyi khri): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
201a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
201a5(nyi khri): shes par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong panyi/
201a6(nyi khri): kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/
201a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus reg pa dang / yid
201a8(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te/
201b1(nyi khri): reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg reg pa'i rkyen gyi
201b2(nyi khri): tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
201b3(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/
201b4(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
201b5(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
201b6(nyi khri): kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid ma yin gyis/ sangs rgyas
201b7(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
201b8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
202a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan
202a2(nyi khri): ba 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub
202a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/
202a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya b.re mi dmigs
202a5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa sar yongs su
202a6(nyi khri): brjor mi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
202a7(nyi khri): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
202a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
202b1(nyi khri): gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
202b2(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
202b3(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
202b4(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pazhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de
202b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
202b6(nyi khri): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar
202b7(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
202b8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
203a1(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba de mi migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzug
203a2(nyi khri): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
203a3(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
203a4(nyi khri): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
203a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
203a6(nyi khri): dang rdza yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba
203a7(nyi khri): dang rtswa sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
203a8(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig zhi zhes
203b1(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
203b2(nyi khri): ba dang / mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
203b3(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mtshan
203b4(nyi khri): ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mngon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang
203b5(nyi khri): lce dang / lus dang / yi dag yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
203b6(nyi khri): gyis chos ston po dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam
203b7(nyi khri): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
203b8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
204a1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi
204a2(nyi khri): rtag ces bye bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
204a3(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
204a4(nyi khri): dang / chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
204a5(nyi khri): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
204a6(nyi khri): ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
204a7(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba
204a8(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzug
204b1(nyi khri): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
204b2(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces/
204b3(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
204b4(nyi khri): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces
204b5(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
204b6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid
204b7(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 1
204b8(nyi khri): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
205a1(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi byar shes pa//
205a2(nyi khri): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
205a3(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces
205a4(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par
205a5(nyi khri): shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang
205a6(nyi khri): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma
205a7(nyi khri): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi
205a8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med nas
205b1(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
205b2(nyi khri): dang Sh+Tha yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
205b3(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
205b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
205b5(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes
205b6(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
205b7(nyi khri): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
205b8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston bcing /
206a1(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang //
206a2(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
206a3(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
206a4(nyi khri): mi 'jug pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
206a5(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg
206a6(nyi khri): pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisgra ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
206a7(nyi khri): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
206a8(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes
206b1(nyi khri): bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yi
206b2(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
206b3(nyi khri): ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg reg pa mtshan ma med
206b4(nyi khri): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'das te
206b5(nyi khri): reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
206b6(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus reg pa dang /
206b7(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
206b8(nyi khri): ces par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus reg pa
207a1(nyi khri): dang rdzasna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi migs
207a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis sa ston pa cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
207a3(nyi khri): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
207a4(nyi khri): tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
207a5(nyi khri): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang
207a6(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar
207a7(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
207a8(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
207b1(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
207b2(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi
207b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang
207b4(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
207b5(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med
207b6(nyi khri): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
207b7(nyi khri): ba dang rtswa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
207b8(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
207b9(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe
208a1(nyi khri): ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
208a2(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
208a3(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
208a4(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
208a5(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med med ces bya bar
208a6(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
208a7(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
208a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
208b1(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te
