208b2(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i byung ba' tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
208b3(nyi khri): ba dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
208b4(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te/
208b5(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar demigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
208b6(nyi khri): bar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes
208b7(nyi khri): gnyen ni gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi rab tu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang
208b8(nyi khri): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba de mi dmig
209a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
209a2(nyi khri): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas
209a3(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcom brgyad kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
209a4(nyi khri): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
209a5(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
209a6(nyi khri): du bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
209a7(nyi khri): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig
209a8(nyi khri): bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sdud
209a9(nyi khri): byang chub bar du sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis chos ston pa dang /
209b1(nyi khri): skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
209b2(nyi khri): tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung
209b3(nyi khri): zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
209b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
209b5(nyi khri): ba bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam
209b6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom
209b7(nyi khri): sems su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
209b8(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i
210a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa des sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i/
210a2(nyi khri): thabs mi mkhas par rig par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
210a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid
210a4(nyi khri): la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yi byed de/ tshor ba dang /
210a5(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang
210a6(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
210a7(nyi khri): de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis rlom sems su byed do// mig nang stong pa zhes bya ba/
210a8(nyi khri): yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya
210a9(nyi khri): kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la sbed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
210b1(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyinapa
210b2(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid
210b3(nyi khri): de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
210b4(nyi khri): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes
210b5(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bA ru yi la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
210b6(nyi khri): la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar
210b7(nyi khri): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med
210b8(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
211a1(nyi khri): la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam
211a2(nyi khri): bar shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par
211a3(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya ba rI lnga byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong zhes bya bar yid la byed//
211a4(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing //
211a5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs// phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la
211a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang / rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'das te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes/
211a7(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
211a8(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
211a9(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs//
211b1(nyi khri): pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyid pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed//
211b2(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa zhes de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa
211b3(nyi khri): nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la stong pa nyid de
211b4(nyi khri): dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes
211b5(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
211b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'das te reg pa'i
211b7(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes
211b8(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de yang
211b9(nyi khri): stong pa
212a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid
212a2(nyi khri): dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de/
212a3(nyi khri): dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// sa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong
212a4(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
212a5(nyi khri): dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/
212a6(nyi khri): nom par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa
212a7(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngo /
212a8(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang /
212a9(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid le byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi
212b1(nyi khri): byi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de
212b2(nyi khri): yang dmigs/ byi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyin stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag
212b3(nyi khri): gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang skyems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
212b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa
212b5(nyi khri): nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang
212b6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
212b7(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
212b8(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
213a1(nyi khri): 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas/
213a2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
213a3(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jig shing sdang la skrag brla 'gyur ro//
213a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bston pa
213a5(nyi khri): 'di thos na 'jig shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
213a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
213a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa mos
213a8(nyi khri): pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par bya
213b1(nyi khri): ba'i mi cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi b+ha'o//
213b2(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po
213b3(nyi khri): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag
213b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
213b5(nyi khri): bas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa/
213b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci
213b7(nyi khri): zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po
213b8(nyi khri): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang
214a1(nyi khri): ldan pa'i mdo sde dang dbyangs kyis bstan pa dang / lung dude bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'ang/
214a2(nyi khri): pa dang / skyes rlabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam par
214a3(nyi khri): 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to// zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
214a4(nyi khri): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdin+dan+ta dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
214a5(nyi khri): drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'i yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
214a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
214a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byed du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
214a8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
214b1(nyi khri): gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
214b2(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // /
214b3(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
214b4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i
214b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/
214b6(nyi khri): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
214b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag
214b8(nyi khri): dag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
215a1(nyi khri): te yang ci zhig bya ba zhes zer ba ni de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi sgra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
215a2(nyi khri): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu
215a3(nyi khri): shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya bar med do// byang chub sems
215a4(nyi khri): dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos shes bya ba yang med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi
215a5(nyi khri): phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub
215a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos shes bya ba yang med do// zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215a7(nyi khri): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dga'
215a8(nyi khri): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
215b1(nyi khri): 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las mi sgra mi ston pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
215b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdug sdig to can dag mkha nod pa slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems
215b3(nyi khri): dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa las zlog te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong
215b4(nyi khri): ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor
215b5(nyi khri): ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la nyan thos kyi sa
215b6(nyi khri): mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni bya chub sems dpa'
215b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang / ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems/
215b8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs
216a1(nyi khri): dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras mngon du byar yod pa
216a2(nyi khri): med par 'khor bar na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur zhing / gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang //
216a3(nyi khri): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon tu byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi
216a4(nyi khri): sgra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /
216a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
216a6(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smor ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
216a7(nyi khri): dang rdza 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
216a8(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang
216a9(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /

216b2(nyi khri): ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma
216b3(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par bya 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag
216b4(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya
216b5(nyi khri): bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
216b6(nyi khri): dang lnga smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
216b7(nyi khri): dang rdza lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyis rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
216b8(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te regs
217a1(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
217a2(nyi khri): 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
217a3(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
217a4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba
217a5(nyi khri): dang rdza sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar
217a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
217a7(nyi khri): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med med pa dang
217a8(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dran pa nye ba
217b1(nyi khri): gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
217b2(nyi khri): 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
217b3(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
217b4(nyi khri): ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar byang
217b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po dag rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
217b6(nyi khri): phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
217b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan
217b8(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma
217b9(nyi khri): ngado
218a1(nyi khri): skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems can la yang tshig med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don
218a2(nyi khri): med pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni bya'i rjes med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
218a3(nyi khri): dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med do// rab 'byo/
218a4(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo//
218a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu zla dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de
218a6(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
218a7(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
218a8(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
218b1(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor/
218b2(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
218b3(nyi khri): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dang
218b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs
218b5(nyi khri): la gnas med med do// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
218b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do//
218b7(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas med do// rab
218b8(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
219a1(nyi khri): / dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus
219a2(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
219a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
219a4(nyi khri): gyis bla la gnas med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis blo dang /
219a5(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
219a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa
219a7(nyi khri): la gnas med do// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sbed pa dang / len pa dang /
219a8(nyi khri): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do// rab 'byode bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
219b1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gis de na
219b2(nyi khri): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
219b3(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
219b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis don med do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//
219b5(nyi khri): bam po bcu gsum pa'o// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste
219b6(nyi khri): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
219b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
219b8(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
220a1(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
220a2(nyi khri): dang rdza 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
220a3(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
220a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med
220a5(nyi khri): do rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
220a6(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i
220a7(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
220a8(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de
220a9(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

220b3(nyi khri): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//

220b6(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med//

221a1(nyi khri): dang chos la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
221a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

221a5(nyi khri): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes

221a8(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub

221b5(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir te/ rab

221b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
221b8(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor

222a2(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te//
222a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/

222a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
222a8(nyi khri): pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

222b2(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do// /
