222b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
222b6(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
222b7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong/
222b8(nyi khri): pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
223a1(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
223a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bde ba rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
223a3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
223a4(nyi khri): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
223a5(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa de dag med bId
223a6(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
223a7(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med
223a8(nyi khri): do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
223b1(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du
223b2(nyi khri): bya ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
223b3(nyi khri): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas pa ma mchis/ gang gi 'gag pa mi mchis
223b4(nyi khri): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /
223b5(nyi khri): gang gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sdu pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs 'gog
223b6(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba
223b7(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes
223b8(nyi khri): ba 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
224a1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye//
224a2(nyi khri): ba med pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
224a3(nyi khri): pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i
224a4(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
224a5(nyi khri): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang //
224a6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
224a7(nyi khri): pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med/
224a8(nyi khri): ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
224b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin byin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
224b2(nyi khri): gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
224b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang / khams dang
224b4(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224b5(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshigi don med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/
224b6(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
224b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms pa
224b8(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
225a1(nyi khri): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de
225a2(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don me do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
225a3(nyi khri): bdag med pa'i phyir bdag med shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang /
225a4(nyi khri): shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po med pa'i phyir bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes
225a5(nyi khri): bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// /
225a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
225a7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
225a8(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi
225b1(nyi khri): gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
225b2(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor
225b3(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
225b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
225b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
225b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
225b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
225b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par grol ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
226a1(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
226a2(nyi khri): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
226a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od
226a4(nyi khri): la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
226a5(nyi khri): do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
226a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od
226a7(nyi khri): la gnas med do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / tshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang /
226a8(nyi khri): tshangs lha nye pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
226b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'
226b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor
226b3(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di
226b4(nyi khri): ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang
226b5(nyi khri): ma yin te/ gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thog pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
226b6(nyi khri): pos/ chos thams cad kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad rig par bya'o// gsol ba/
226b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldam 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab
226b8(nyi khri): par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams ca/
227a1(nyi khri): kha na ma tho ba med pa dang
227a2(nyi khri): ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / 'jigs rten pa dang / 'jig rten 'das pa dang / zag
227a3(nyi khri): ba dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab
227a4(nyi khri): 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang med pa nyid la bslab par
227a5(nyi khri): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge
227a6(nyi khri): ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong
227a7(nyi khri): du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na/ rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las
227a8(nyi khri): byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
227a9(nyi khri): rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bru can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par bstsags pa'i 'du shes dang /
227b1(nyi khri): rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes
227b2(nyi khri): dang lnga rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
227b3(nyi khri): par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
227b4(nyi khri): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa
227b5(nyi khri): dang sgra skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i
227b6(nyi khri): chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ ji ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i
227b7(nyi khri): chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal ba dang / chags
227b8(nyi khri): sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phra dog dang / ser sna dang
228a1(nyi khri): nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal dang / rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung ma bstan pa'i chos
228a2(nyi khri): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'byung
228a3(nyi khri): ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o//
228a4(nyi khri): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o//
228a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ phung po dang /
228a6(nyi khri): khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang
228a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin pa 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'a
228a8(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
228b1(nyi khri): dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga po dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'bogs pa'i lam
228b2(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongasu
228b3(nyi khri): shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting
228b4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya bas/ rnam
228b5(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang 'du shes dang ldan
228b6(nyi khri): pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang da
228b7(nyi khri): bar 'das te/ thog pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te na mkha' mtha' yas
228b8(nyi khri): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skyes mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam
229a1(nyi khri): par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du/
229a2(nyi khri): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cu zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug
229a3(nyi khri): pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas te ba 'di
229a4(nyi khri): ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar
229a5(nyi khri): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na
229a6(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can
229a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas
229a8(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par spyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam/ gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las
229b1(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyi de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam
229b2(nyi khri): par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang
229b3(nyi khri): spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ gtang snyoms dang ldan pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam
229b4(nyi khri): gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnams pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par
229b5(nyi khri): gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
229b6(nyi khri): cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
229b7(nyi khri): so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
229b8(nyi khri): te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das
229b9(nyi khri): cung zad med pa'i skyed mched 'a nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad
230a1(nyi khri): terdza 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang /
230a2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
230a3(nyi khri): mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya//
230a4(nyi khri): 'o gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes
230a5(nyi khri): bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon/
230a6(nyi khri): par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
230a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
230a8(nyi khri): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
230b1(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
230b2(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rip+pa bzhi dang /
230b3(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
230b4(nyi khri): 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
230b5(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang /
230b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags//
230b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur
230b8(nyi khri): ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos
231a1(nyi khri): makyi dbyings/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni dus ma byas kyi chos shes gyug
231a2(nyi khri): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mongs gi chos shes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi dang
231a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos shes bya
231a4(nyi khri): 'ogasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/
231a5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o//
231a6(nyi khri): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med
231a7(nyi khri): bas chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o//
231a8(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
231b1(nyi khri): bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges
231b2(nyi khri): ba'i bul byed par 'gyur bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom lda 'das sems can gyi phung po chen pos nges pa de
231b3(nyi khri): lta bu'i phul byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
231b4(nyi khri): stsal ga rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / byir
231b5(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231b6(nyi khri): chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro//
231b7(nyi khri): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
231b8(nyi khri): rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems
232a1(nyi khri): bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go ca bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su
232a2(nyi khri): btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya
232a3(nyi khri): ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas chos
232a4(nyi khri): thams cad bskye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin
232a5(nyi khri): ba drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyis tshul gcig tu bsgrub
232a6(nyi khri): ba khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pas thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
232a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po
232a8(nyi khri): nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed do// sems can dmyal
232b1(nyi khri): dang rdza byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag/
232b2(nyi khri): thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems
232b3(nyi khri): 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
232b4(nyi khri): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs
232b5(nyi khri): de lta bus sems can thams kyis don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i bar du
232b6(nyi khri): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas gdod bdag gis don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal ba bye ba khrag
232b7(nyi khri): khrig bye ba brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bstsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'i
232b8(nyi khri): snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub
233a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
233a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po
233a3(nyi khri): che skyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlab po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang/
233a4(nyi khri): gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang rgya
233a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o//
233a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/
233a7(nyi khri): sems mi skul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa
233a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o// sems des sems can thams cad kyi bul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
233b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
233b2(nyi khri): bo'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong la des rloms sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
233b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i tshul mi dmigs tshul gyis byed do// rab
233b4(nyi khri): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos
233b5(nyi khri): bar bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// chos gang zhe na/ chos thams dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe
233b6(nyi khri): na gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de la chos la dag pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o//
233b7(nyi khri): de la chos la dga' ba mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de tan du bya ba ste/ 'di ni chos la
233b8(nyi khri): mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rna
233b9(nyi khri): ra'adi ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// /
234a1(nyi khri): 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
234a2(nyi khri): bsasems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
234a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/
234a4(nyi khri): kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
234a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
234a6(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
234a7(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
234a8(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/
234b1(nyi khri): sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
234b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
234b3(nyi khri): gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
234b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
234b5(nyi khri): chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dang /
234b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i
234b7(nyi khri): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can
234b8(nyi khri): dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba bor lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med
235a1(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pha rol tu byin pa dang /
235a2(nyi khri): bar lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
235a3(nyi khri): kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / d+ya ba'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya/
235a4(nyi khri): bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun su lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su
235a5(nyi khri): mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems
235a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang pa ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i
235a7(nyi khri): phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
235a8(nyi khri): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
235a9(nyi khri): spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par
235b1(nyi khri): dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed/
235b2(nyi khri): doHpha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
235b3(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
235b4(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dmig shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
235b5(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
235b6(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
235b7(nyi khri): par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab
235b8(nyi khri): 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba/
236a1(nyi khri): yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
236a2(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/
236a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spob ba
236a4(nyi khri): skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spob pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam
236a5(nyi khri): ba dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma legs pa'i sems de lta bu'i la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du
236a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khong du chud pa ma
236a7(nyi khri): mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongasu chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin stong pa
236a8(nyi khri): nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus//
236b1(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan
236b2(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
236b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang po skyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang /
236b4(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing 'gag
236b5(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / 'bel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos
236b6(nyi khri): thos kyi sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do//
236b7(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
236b8(nyi khri): dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med cing / khongs
237a1(nyi khri): su chud pa med pa de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do// zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang
237a2(nyi khri): chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa
237a3(nyi khri): med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
237a4(nyi khri): chags pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi bar yang chags pa medo/
237a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar yang chags pa med do// smos pa/ tshe dang ldan
237a6(nyi khri): ba rab 'byor gyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag med cing khongs su chud pa med do zhes smras pa/ de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang lda
237a7(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos
237a8(nyi khri): dang lnga rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sad+yas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa
237b1(nyi khri): med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
237b2(nyi khri): cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// /
237b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khos su chud pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de/
237b4(nyi khri): lta ma yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa
237b5(nyi khri): shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bu yang rang bzhin stong
237b6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs
237b7(nyi khri): su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa
237b8(nyi khri): med cing khongs su chud med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs
238a1(nyi khri): su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa medado//
238a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang
238a3(nyi khri): khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa de ni ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ gzugs med pa yang /
238a4(nyi khri): gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
238a5(nyi khri): rnams kyi bar du med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/
238a6(nyi khri): rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
238a7(nyi khri): bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam
238a8(nyi khri): par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du me ba yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
238b1(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
238b2(nyi khri): ba nyid la chags pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi
238b3(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis
238b4(nyi khri): rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang
238b5(nyi khri): gang gri bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang
238b6(nyi khri): spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed gcig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i
238b7(nyi khri): sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po de la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems
238b8(nyi khri): can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad
239a1(nyi khri): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smra ba/
239a2(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi che zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa
239a3(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems thams cad kyi don tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nye tse'i phyir/ tshul khrims
239a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo // /
239a5(nyi khri): sems can nyung zad nye tse'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
239a6(nyi khri): spyod cing bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nye tse'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams
239a7(nyi khri): cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nye rtse'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam
239a8(nyi khri): gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan bskyed do// sems can nyung zad nye tse'i phyir/ shes
239b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom mo//
239b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can
239b3(nyi khri): 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod
239b4(nyi khri): par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// /
239b5(nyi khri): de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi/
239b6(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams
239b7(nyi khri): cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang
239b8(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med
240a1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
240a2(nyi khri): dang lnga stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
240a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la
240a4(nyi khri): gnas par bya ba'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
240a5(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// /
240a6(nyi khri): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/
240a7(nyi khri): bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod du'i
240a8(nyi khri): tshe sbyin glang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yin gyi/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yin
240b1(nyi khri): la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
240b2(nyi khri): sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
240b3(nyi khri): go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
240b4(nyi khri): sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
240b5(nyi khri): kye pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
240b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten
240b7(nyi khri): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
240b8(nyi khri): byin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
241a1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
241a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol rol tu phyin phyin pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
241a3(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems/
241a4(nyi khri): rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems
241a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go tsa'o// tshe dang
241a6(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam
241a7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong
241a8(nyi khri): ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems de ba'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa
241b1(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go tsa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
241b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/
241b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
241b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang
241b5(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs
241b6(nyi khri): su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
241b7(nyi khri): tI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
241b8(nyi khri): cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242a1(nyi khri): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems/
242a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos/
242a3(nyi khri): pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
242a4(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
242a5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu bla la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
242a6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
242a7(nyi khri): byin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
242a8(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu bla la spyod pa'i
242b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
242b2(nyi khri): ba'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams sgyu mar
242b3(nyi khri): byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
242b4(nyi khri): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
242b5(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshu
242b6(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de lta spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
242b7(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
242b8(nyi khri): bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
243a1(nyi khri): @thun mong du byas shing / bu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
243a2(nyi khri): paba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
243a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
243a4(nyi khri): bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
243a5(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
243a6(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
243a7(nyi khri): bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / bsten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i
243a8(nyi khri): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
243b1(nyi khri): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed//
243b2(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
243b3(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
243b4(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
243b5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi blo'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
243b6(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu
243b7(nyi khri): byin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/
243b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
244a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir/
244a2(nyi khri): go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
244a3(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong
244a4(nyi khri): zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
244a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang byang
244a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsu ma yin
244a7(nyi khri): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
244a8(nyi khri): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/
244b1(nyi khri): ba la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang srungs/
244b2(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan 'a ba'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
244b3(nyi khri): de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i
244b4(nyi khri): pha rol phyin pa'o// tshe ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
244b5(nyi khri): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du
244b6(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing rtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson
244b7(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yi
244b8(nyi khri): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
245a1(nyi khri): bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
245a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub suM dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
245a3(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
245a4(nyi khri): te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas/
245a5(nyi khri): shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
245a6(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
245a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyi ri go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
245a8(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
245b1(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
245b2(nyi khri): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
245b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan sha ra dA ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/
245b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam
245b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
245b6(nyi khri): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
245b7(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang bA shA rA dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
245b8(nyi khri): byin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brjod
246a1(nyi khri): pa yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong/
246a2(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
246a3(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
246a4(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed do// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
246a5(nyi khri): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
246a6(nyi khri): pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
246a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
246a8(nyi khri): yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
246b1(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
246b2(nyi khri): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te//
246b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
246b4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
246b5(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar byA ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
246b6(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
246b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
246b8(nyi khri): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i dge ba'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
247a1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

247a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
247a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
247a7(nyi khri): chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
247a8(nyi khri): tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
247b1(nyi khri): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

247b7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

248a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang
248a4(nyi khri): chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang byang chub
248a5(nyi khri): la mtshan mar mi byed mi dmigs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go/
248a6(nyi khri): cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
248a7(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang //
248a8(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs ming/
248b1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar yang mi byed do// bsam gang+gA dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang /
248b2(nyi khri): mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
248b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
248b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
248b5(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
248b6(nyi khri): rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
248b7(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
248b8(nyi khri): sha re dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar go cha chen po bgos la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang /
249a1(nyi khri): lho nung dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
249a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems
249a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul
249a4(nyi khri): gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrogs go// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/
249a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang da par zhugs zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras
249a6(nyi khri): brdza tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drag la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
249a7(nyi khri): spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i ngag dang bde ba can bsam
249a8(nyi khri): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so// de byams
249b1(nyi khri): ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa// bcug med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin/
249b2(nyi khri): tu bsgom pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i ba'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//
249b3(nyi khri): dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa
249b4(nyi khri): yongasu rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgom pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod
249b5(nyi khri): do/ de tshad med pa 'di dang / gzugs med pa na' yod pa 'di dag la na mkha' rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang //
249b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol
249b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang
249b8(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen lnga yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
250a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med
250a2(nyi khri): badz+raganod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgom pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
250a3(nyi khri): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' dang ldan pa dang / gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs
250a4(nyi khri): badz+ra mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgom pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
250a5(nyi khri): na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par gakang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa
250a6(nyi khri): dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs/ gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gnyis pa dang /
250a7(nyi khri): gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mche
250a8(nyi khri): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
250a9(nyi khri): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
250b1(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa rab tu spong ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
250b2(nyi khri): pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed do// de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin
250b3(nyi khri): du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
250b4(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang
250b5(nyi khri): yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po'i tshul khrims
250b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu bla ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad
250b7(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mong pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan
250b8(nyi khri): to snyams du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
251a1(nyi khri): @chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
251a2(nyi khri): la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa zam
251a3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub
