251a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom
251a5(nyi khri): bar 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cipa rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
251a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
251a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa
251a8(nyi khri): dang rdza sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
251b1(nyi khri): rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa/
251b2(nyi khri): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
251b3(nyi khri): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
251b4(nyi khri): bo ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bas gtan dang /
251b5(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
251b6(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin ga
251b7(nyi khri): ba'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
251b8(nyi khri): ba rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
252a1(nyi khri): dang snying rtse
252a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pas sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i
252a3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin la skams par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par bya'o zhes de la gzhol byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
252a4(nyi khri): par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i nyam su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad
252a5(nyi khri): dgrol bar bya'o sems can la sems so// gtang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab tu
252a6(nyi khri): gzhol bar byed de/ de ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa'
252a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams
252a8(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
252a9(nyi khri): ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med
252b1(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyis 'bru/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar 'dod
252b2(nyi khri): pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po tshad med pa rnam la spyod pa'i bzod
252b3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos
252b4(nyi khri): rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs pa bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
252b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad
252b6(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
252b7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis yang 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems
252b8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
253a1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid b+ha bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag lnga
253a2(nyi khri): yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam
253a3(nyi khri): pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med
253a4(nyi khri): par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa'i sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
253a5(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga'
253a6(nyi khri): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
253a7(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
253a8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams
253b1(nyi khri): cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhog par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
253b2(nyi khri): ba chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug mi
253b3(nyi khri): rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
253b4(nyi khri): ti'i bu 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
253b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa mi 'jug par mi byed de/ dus gsum mi dmigs
253b6(nyi khri): ba'i tshul gyis 'di la dus mi shes pa yang med pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa
253b7(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs
253b8(nyi khri): med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par yang mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
254a1(nyi khri): ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shu ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan/
254a2(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang banas
254a3(nyi khri): ba dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes
254a4(nyi khri): pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
254a5(nyi khri): bu 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'
254a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
254a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pi tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/
254a8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma
254b1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
254b2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
254b3(nyi khri): dag par gnas kyang des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas
254b4(nyi khri): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub
254b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de yang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab
254b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha d+hA ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
254b7(nyi khri): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
254b8(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam
255a1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
255a2(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i
255a3(nyi khri): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo rnam pa thams
255a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsgom mo//
255a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags bden pa rnam
255a6(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom
255a7(nyi khri): bar 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
255a8(nyi khri): ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
255b1(nyi khri): bsgos so// ma bams cad margyu dang rnan pa'i dus byas du sa pa/ gnam pa nas 'a rnyan pa par da sa sgyu dang/
255b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo// rdo dang ldan
255b3(nyi khri): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
255b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do/
255b5(nyi khri): zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
255b6(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i
255b7(nyi khri): phyir/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu bya zhes bya ba
255b8(nyi khri): 'di gling tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas mo gtan gyim
256a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bying tsam du zad do//
256a2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byi stong pa nyid rjes
256a3(nyi khri): bya bar 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
256a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
256a5(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
256a6(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
256a7(nyi khri): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
256a8(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i
256b1(nyi khri): byir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid rjes bya ba 'di ni/
256b2(nyi khri): ming tsam du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos
256b3(nyi khri): skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmig su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmig su med pa'i
256b4(nyi khri): phyir byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang
256b5(nyi khri): dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen glo la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
256b6(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa
256b7(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i
256b8(nyi khri): tshul du gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par
257a1(nyi khri): bya ba'i phyir sa byas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sang+yas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
257a2(nyi khri): dra ba'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas
257a3(nyi khri): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can kyi 'di
257a4(nyi khri): shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa gnas shing lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i
257a5(nyi khri): mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to// de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur gyi bar du theg pa
257a6(nyi khri): de dang nam yang mI 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha drang /
257a7(nyi khri): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig
257a8(nyi khri): rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
257b1(nyi khri): shwar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed drag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten
257b2(nyi khri): gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa/
257b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrogs cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//
257b4(nyi khri): lho dang nu// nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nab dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang
257b5(nyi khri): ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpal
257b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pA yang dag bla rdzogs pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
257b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lo bar byed do// zhes grags sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu bya
257b8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas
258a1(nyi khri): to/ bcom ldan 'das go chen po bgos so// go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/
258a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
258a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
258a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'i dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go/
258a5(nyi khri): cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/
258a6(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/
258a7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par
258a8(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
258b1(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi gocha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs
258b2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ gar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas
258b3(nyi khri): par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
258b4(nyi khri): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klang gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par gleng
258b5(nyi khri): so// stongs gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drag tu rab tu bskyed de/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
258b6(nyi khri): bye sa snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang /
258b7(nyi khri): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
258b8(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na mas can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
259a1(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems
259a2(nyi khri): can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba thob nas/ de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag
259a3(nyi khri): sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par lang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu
259a4(nyi khri): skye'o// de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
259a5(nyi khri): rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab
259a6(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun
259a7(nyi khri): du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang
259a8(nyi khri): chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang /
259b1(nyi khri): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
259b2(nyi khri): mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba'i dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol
259b3(nyi khri): pad+ma bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i
259b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongasu grol bar byas pa med do// de ci'i
259b5(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin nyid blo'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
259b6(nyi khri): bo go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
259b7(nyi khri): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bai dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur
259b8(nyi khri): ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par spru la nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed de/ skom 'dod pa rnams kyi
260a1(nyi khri): skom/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams gzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'thephre sa/
260a2(nyi khri): spros 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal nA/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la chog
260a3(nyi khri): yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rtsi dang / yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang /
260a4(nyi khri): man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul gyi sbyin pa
260a5(nyi khri): byed cing / mi'i ye byed gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/
260a6(nyi khri): sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tub drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/
260a7(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dpe
260a8(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sbyim mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lem po che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ ras
260b1(nyi khri): 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan
260b2(nyi khri): bu mkhas pa des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
260b3(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad
260b4(nyi khri): gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang sems can gang yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis
260b5(nyi khri): de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
260b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing ched du bsam te/ skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing //
260b7(nyi khri): de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas pas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
260b8(nyi khri): dang \u0f7fgzugs med med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
261a1(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med bdud/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mazang kyis gnas pa'i skyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'bugs pa'i/
261a2(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
261a3(nyi khri): pa rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god te/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang bar rdzogs
261a4(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
261a5(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/
261a6(nyi khri): sems can de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/
261a7(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas
261a8(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
261b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod te//
261b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod de/ sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i
261b3(nyi khri): chos nyid nye bar bzung nas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
261b4(nyi khri): ni go cha chen po bgos ba shes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// bam po bco lnga pa'o//
261b5(nyi khri): / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
261b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god
261b7(nyi khri): do// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i
261b8(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas
262a1(nyi khri): nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'jug pa'i/
262a2(nyi khri): sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha gyon cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
262a3(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs
262a4(nyi khri): shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar ba dang / rab tu dgod par byas nas/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i
262a5(nyi khri): mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems glang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
262a6(nyi khri): bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can
262a7(nyi khri): gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos rnams kyis de bzhin pa'i
262a8(nyi khri): byir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262b1(nyi khri): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor
262b2(nyi khri): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang /
262b3(nyi khri): dgra par skul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
262b4(nyi khri): bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/
262b5(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus
262b6(nyi khri): dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyams sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems
262b7(nyi khri): kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
262b8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la
263a1(nyi khri): bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/
263a2(nyi khri): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan/
263a3(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang
263a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing
263a5(nyi khri): gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug
263a6(nyi khri): pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam
263a7(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / 'god pa byed do// de ltar yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
263a8(nyi khri): ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
263b1(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa shig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste// skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang mo'i tshogs shog mngo
263b2(nyi khri): bar sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu mi'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can
263b3(nyi khri): gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ab
263b4(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang // sems can gang yang bsam
263b5(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu mi'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/
263b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor bzhan yang byang chub sems sa dpa' sems dpa'
263b7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab
263b8(nyi khri): 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing // sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
264a1(nyi khri): @#pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
264a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byed pa 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol mi dmigs
264a3(nyi khri): te rtsarab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te// de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
264a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig
264a5(nyi khri): gis lam po che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
264a6(nyi khri): dag par skal te gzhog cing 'god na// rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang shes
264a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
264a8(nyi khri): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po des sos can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la bka/
264b1(nyi khri): pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems/
264b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi
264b3(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed drag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems
264b4(nyi khri): can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
264b5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du
264b6(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// /
264b7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyis chos ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sang
264b8(nyi khri): ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho dang / nub dang / bya dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nu byang dang /
265a1(nyi khri): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dag tu so zhing/ ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
265a2(nyi khri): byin pa la gnas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul
265a3(nyi khri): zhing gzhog go 'god do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
265a4(nyi khri): tu byin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de
265a5(nyi khri): dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
265a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mnan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam bai che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi
265a7(nyi khri): mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par skul zhing / bzhag ste/ bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du
265a8(nyi khri): sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang blar skul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod pa yod dam/
265b1(nyi khri): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sha
265b2(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang /
265b3(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod
265b4(nyi khri): kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis
265b5(nyi khri): de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po go cha chen po bgo sa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
265b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sa chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed
265b7(nyi khri): de/ bdag gi sems can ji snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig
265b8(nyi khri): ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rang
266a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs
266a2(nyi khri): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
266a3(nyi khri): bco brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par
266a4(nyi khri): bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang //
266a5(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed
266a6(nyi khri): cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// zhes bya ba
266a7(nyi khri): sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med pa grangs med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis
266a8(nyi khri): sems can tshad med grangs med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
266b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la
266b2(nyi khri): dgod par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i
266b3(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i
266b4(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
266b5(nyi khri): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
266b6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang dag nyid la dgod pa
266b7(nyi khri): bya'o// rang byang chub sems la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i
266b8(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par
267a1(nyi khri): sprul te/ 'di snyams du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
267a2(nyi khri): gyi bar la dgod par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can
267a3(nyi khri): gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa dug la bkod par byas pa yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de
267a4(nyi khri): ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa pha rol tu
267a5(nyi khri): phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par sems bskyed kyang / sems can gang gi don du yang sems bskyed pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
267a6(nyi khri): 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
267a7(nyi khri): shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
267a8(nyi khri): ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ gzugs gzugs kyis
267b1(nyi khri): stong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mig mig gis stong ngo // de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
267b2(nyi khri): lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi
267b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par
267b4(nyi khri): shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i
267b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ mig gi 'dra/
267b6(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
267b7(nyi khri): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol
267b8(nyi khri): tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
268a1(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu bas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis sbyong ngo // dngos
268a2(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
268a3(nyi khri): sum bcu rtsa bdun gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
268a4(nyi khri): dang lnga mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smom pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
268a5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
268a6(nyi khri): pa rnams sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad kyis stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang bang chub sems dpas slong ngo // go cha chen po yang go cha
268a7(nyi khri): chen pos stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o// bcom
268a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rabu de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
268b1(nyi khri): ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas//
268b2(nyi khri): rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma
268b3(nyi khri): bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyi/
268b4(nyi khri): mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas rnam
268b5(nyi khri): par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma
268b6(nyi khri): byas/ mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed// mngon par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
268b7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
268b8(nyi khri): yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos
269a1(nyi khri): mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
269a2(nyi khri): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do//
269a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
269a4(nyi khri): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon myi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
269a5(nyi khri): tshor ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dang / lce'i
269a6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor mi byed/ rnam par mi byed//
269a7(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor bdag mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sem
269a8(nyi khri): can ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ba shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang /
269b1(nyi khri): shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
269b2(nyi khri): de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
269b3(nyi khri): sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
269b4(nyi khri): de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs
269b5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
269b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab
269b7(nyi khri): 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/
269b8(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/
270a1(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
270a2(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
270a3(nyi khri): dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
270a4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang drag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
270a5(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byedado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
270a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
270a7(nyi khri): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
270a8(nyi khri): deng / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab
270b1(nyi khri): 'byor byang chub ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhye
270b2(nyi khri): pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rnam pa thams
270b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems
270b4(nyi khri): can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos
270b5(nyi khri): shes bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// /
270b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
270b7(nyi khri): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin/
270b8(nyi khri): nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma
271a1(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i
271a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di
271a3(nyi khri): rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mi yor lta bu dang /
271a4(nyi khri): gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'a di sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
271a5(nyi khri): dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
271a6(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /
271a7(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// da ltar byung ba'i
271a8(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs med pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings
271b1(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs
271b2(nyi khri): dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol
271b3(nyi khri): ba'o// gzugs ma skye ba'i phyir gzugs ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma
271b4(nyi khri): grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma
271b5(nyi khri): grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings
271b6(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
271b7(nyi khri): shes pa ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
271b8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor
272a1(nyi khri): pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'a byed dang / rnam par shes pa nim bcings pa grol bu'o// dang ldan pa byung po drug pa dang bcas pa'i zlugapa rnaM
272a2(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa med
272a3(nyi khri): pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa med pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe ldan pa gang po
272a4(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes
272a5(nyi khri): ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dbyen pa'i
272a6(nyi khri): phyir rnam be shes pa ma bcing dra ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
272a7(nyi khri): bshes ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i ba'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
272a8(nyi khri): ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
272b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang
272b2(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// /
272b3(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
272b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
272b5(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// /
272b6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
272b7(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa
272b8(nyi khri): nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
273a1(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa ga
273a2(nyi khri): po byang chub kyi mchog kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs/ chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ma bcing
273a3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i
273a4(nyi khri): stobs bcu dbar dang / mI 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ste/ tshe dang
273a5(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings
273a6(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad
273a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dpe ni phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// mi skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems
273a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma bcings ma grog ba ste// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// /
273b1(nyi khri): ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin cing
273b2(nyi khri): dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste// tshe dang
273b3(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcing ma grol ba'o// med pa'i
273b4(nyi khri): phyir yang dag pa'i mthi' bar du ma cings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'dus ma
273b5(nyi khri): byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dpe ni phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma
273b6(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
273b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
273b8(nyi khri): rol phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings pa grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'
274a1(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhin ma yin
274a2(nyi khri): bde bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang // chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'dus ma byas ma
274a3(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
274a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyin la gnas// /
274a5(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang // ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang // ma bcings ma grol
274a6(nyi khri): kha'i chos skyon med pa nyid/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ ma bcings ma grol ba de ma
274a7(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//
274a8(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs
274b1(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// /
274b2(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcangs ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral
274b3(nyi khri): bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i
274b4(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//
274b5(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la
274b6(nyi khri): rab tu 'god par 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol bas
274b7(nyi khri): med pa dang / dben pa dang / ma skyes pa nye bar bzung zhing / chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
274b8(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'i theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
275a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275a2(nyi khri): chen pos ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags/ theg pa de ni gang nas 'byung ba lags/ theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur lags/
275a3(nyi khri): theg pa chen po su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang
275a4(nyi khri): khyod de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni glang zhes zer ba ni// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
275a5(nyi khri): chen po ste/ drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang da bzod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
275a6(nyi khri): ba dang / sngon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
275a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang bla'i yid la bya bas don du gnyer ba rnams la phyi nang gi dngos po'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ste/ de yang sems
275a8(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
275b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ga
275b2(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
275b3(nyi khri): bas/ bdag kyang dge bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing / gnas la/ sems can pha rol kyang dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag
275b4(nyi khri): bar skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyamasa'o// gsol ba/
275b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
275b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs la/ gzhan yang mi dmigs
275b7(nyi khri): ba'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
275b8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
276a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson
276a2(nyi khri): ba mi 'dor zhing / gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
276a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// gsol bA/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom 'das kyis bka'
276a4(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bsam gtan
276a5(nyi khri): rnams la thabs mkhas pas/ mnyam par gzhog kyang de dag gi dbang gis mi skye zhing / gzhan yang bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul
276a6(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/
276a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad
276a8(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med par chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtogs
276b1(nyi khri): bar byed cing / sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang
276b2(nyi khri): dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems
276b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
276b4(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
276b5(nyi khri): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
276b6(nyi khri): dang sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
276b7(nyi khri): ba nyid de/ de la nang stong pa zhe na/ nang gi chos shes bya ba ni/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la mi rtag mi 'jigs pa'i phyir/ mig mig
276b8(nyi khri): gis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir rdza ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyi stong ngo // de cig
277a1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do// de la byi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi'i chos shes bya ba ni gzugs dang / sgra dang /
277a2(nyi khri): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams te/ de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin
277a3(nyi khri): du mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni byi stong pa nyid ces
277a4(nyi khri): bya'o// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / 'di ni phyi nang gi chos shes bya ste/ de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ nAng gi chos rna
277a5(nyi khri): chos rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// phyi'i chos rnams nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de/
277a6(nyi khri): yin pa'i phyir ro// de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos nyid
277a7(nyi khri): des stong pa nyid stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhes na/ mi rtag
277a8(nyi khri): mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ shar phyogs shar phyogs kyis stong ngo // lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong / nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong / byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong /
277b1(nyi khri): 'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong // steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong ngo // phyogs mtshams rnams phyogs mtshams rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
277b2(nyi khri): de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ mi rtag mi 'jig
277b3(nyi khri): ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa de yang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces
277b4(nyi khri): bya'o// de la 'dus byas stong nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ demi rtag
277b5(nyi khri): mi 'jig pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyis khams kyis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs
277b6(nyi khri): med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang
277b7(nyi khri): zhes na/ 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ni 'dus ma byas shes bya ste/ mi
277b8(nyi khri): rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhes
278a1(nyi khri): bya'o// de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ glung la mtha' mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pas stong ste/ mi rtag mi
278a2(nyi khri): 'jig pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni mtha' 'das pa stong pa
278a3(nyi khri): nyid ces bya'o// de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la thog ma mi dmigs shing / tha ma yang mi dmigs pa de la 'gro ba mI dmigs/ 'ong
278a4(nyi khri): ba yang mi dmigs te/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i
278a5(nyi khri): phyir te/ 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med nyid ces bya'o// de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang yang dor ba med pa ste/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir dor ba med
278a6(nyi khri): ba dor ba med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya 'o// de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang
278a7(nyi khri): zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas rnams
278a8(nyi khri): kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
278b1(nyi khri): rnams kyis byas te/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni rang bzhin ste/
278b2(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
278b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig
278b4(nyi khri): gA rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shis pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yi/
278b5(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
